<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04602318.94</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04602318.94</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Buchdruck</string>
            <string language="en">Printing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Impression</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imprimir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stampa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτύπωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Impresión</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Einführung in die einzelnen Arbeitsschritte beim Buchdruck mit beweglichen Lettern. Anschliessend ist interaktiv die Aufgabe zu lösen, in der richtigen Reihenfolge alle Schritte zu durchlaufen. Mit Möglichkeit der Überprüfung.</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction to the different procedures in printing with mobile characters. Subsequently, interactively go through all the procedure in correct order. Quiz for testing skills possible.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Buchdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Gutenberg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Printing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Good mountain</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction aux différentes procédures dans 
l'impression avec les caractères mobiles. Ultérieurement, 
passez en mode interactif par tout le procédé dans la commande 
correcte. Questionnez pour des qualifications de test possibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução aos procedimentos diferentes em 
imprimir com caráteres móveis. Subseqüentemente, atravesse 
interativamente todo o procedimento na ordem correta. Quiz para 
as habilidades testando possíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione alle procedure differenti nella 
stampa con i caratteri mobili. Successivamente, passi con 
interazione con tutta la procedura nell'ordine corretto. Quiz 
per le abilità difficili possibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή στις διαφορετικές διαδικασίες στην εκτύπωση 
με τους κινητούς χαρακτήρες. Στη συνέχεια, αμφίδρομα 
περάστε από όλη τη διαδικασία στη σωστή κατάταξη. 
Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων για τη δοκιμή των δεξιοτήτων πιθανών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción a los diversos procedimientos en la
impresión con los caracteres móviles. Posteriormente, pase 
recíprocamente con todo el procedimiento en orden correcta. 
Quiz para las habilidades de prueba posibles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Impression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bonne montagne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Imprimir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Montanha boa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stampa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Montagna buona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκτύπωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καλό βουνό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Impresión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Buena montaña</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
